row.process:
@echo off :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
!Parameter declaration :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Directory" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Mode" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_MODE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#
!Check EXT: of parameters
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Directory" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Mode" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_FILE_MODE#
set /a errors=0 > nul
!creates a link using mklink command :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Target file/dir &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# does not exist" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) SET FILE_TARGET_ISFILE=%ISFILE% SET FILE_TARGET_ISDIR=%ISDIR%
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Link Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR# where symbolic file should be created does not exist" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul )
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 set retcode=100 goto :retcode :ENDIF
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
!Start execution :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
cd /d "&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create &UC4RB_FILE_MODE# link &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME# of &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# in &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_MODE# = "HARD" IF %FILE_TARGET_ISDIR% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# is a directory. Hard link is not allowed for directory." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR set retcode=1 goto :retcode ) : SET &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#,'%','%%') : SET &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_FILE_TARGET#,'%','%%') mklink /H "&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#" "&UC4RB_FILE_TARGET#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_MODE# = "SYMBOLIC" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#,'%','%%') : SET &UC4RB_FILE_TARGET# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_FILE_TARGET#,'%','%%') IF %FILE_TARGET_ISFILE% == 1 ( mklink "&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#" "&UC4RB_FILE_TARGET#" ) ELSE ( mklink /D "&UC4RB_FILE_LINK_NAME#" "&UC4RB_FILE_TARGET#" ) :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
